AltTitle: Apollo Shows Your Skills to Teams
AltContent: Become a member of Apollo, show your skills, meet with teams.
SecondAltContent: Find the best team for you. Start the fight.
PlayInATeamTitle: Play in the teams of your dreams
PlayInATeamContent: CSGO, Valorant, League of Legends? Introduce yourself to the biggest in the industry and get the chance to play in those teams.
FooterText: At Apollo, teams apply for candidates. Professional players play in the best teams with profiles.
SelectUserTypeContent: Select your user type for attend the Apollo World.
AccepContracts: I read and accept all contracts.
